creditline: Gift of Scotty and Peter Gillette
description: primarily light brown/rust--multicolors; horizontal patterned stripes (zigzags, diamonds, X's) with five vertical zigzag bands; checked pile bands with central squares at ends, with stripes and twisted orange fringe at short ends; heading band on back at one short end (top)

title: Rug
